title: Emergency (Kool & the Gang album)
text:
Emergency is the sixteenth studio album by the <a href="United%20States">American</a> band <a href="Kool%20%26amp%3B%20the%20Gang">Kool & the Gang</a>, released in 1984. It ultimately became the group's biggest selling career album, earning <a href="Double%20Platinum">Double Platinum</a> status in America, Platinum in Canada, and Silver in the UK.
The album produced four US top 20 hit singles including "Fresh" (US #9); "Misled" (US #10); the title track "Emergency" (US #18); and the album's biggest hit, the million-selling "Cherish" (US #2). "Fresh", "Misled", and "Cherish" also cracked the top 40 in the UK reaching #11, #28, and #4 respectively while "Emergency" only reached #50 in that country.
